raw: * Returns an array of currently selected items.

raw: * Adds a new child widget.
* The supported keys of the layout options map depend on the layout manager
* used to position the widget. The options are documented in the class
* documentation of each layout manager {@link qx.ui.layout}.
* @param child {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} the item to add.
* @param options {Map?null} Optional layout data for item.
* @return {qx.ui.core.Widget} This object (for chaining support)

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds a new child widget. The supported keys of the layout options map depend on the layout manager used to position the widget. The options are documented in the class documentation of each layout manager {@link qx.ui.layout}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: child {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} the item to add.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: options {Map?null} Optional layout data for item.

@description.name: @description

raw: * Returns the index position of the given item if it is
* a child item. Otherwise it returns -1.
* This method works on the widget's children list. Some layout managers
* (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional
* layout information. Other layout manager (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.Grid})
* ignore the children order for the layout process.
* @param child {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} the item to query for
* @return {Integer} The index position or -1 when
*   the given item is no child of this layout.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the index position of the given item if it is a child item. Otherwise it returns -1. This method works on the widget's children list. Some layout managers (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional layout information. Other layout manager (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.Grid}) ignore the children order for the layout process.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: child {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} the item to query for

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer} The index position or -1 when the given item is no child of this layout.

raw: * Add a child at the specified index
* This method works on the widget's children list. Some layout managers
* (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional
* layout information. Other layout manager (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.Grid})
* ignore the children order for the layout process.
* @param child {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} item to add
* @param index {Integer} Index, at which the item will be inserted
* @param options {Map?null} Optional layout data for item.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Add a child at the specified index This method works on the widget's children list. Some layout managers (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional layout information. Other layout manager (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.Grid}) ignore the children order for the layout process.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: child {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} item to add

@param.name: @param
@param.body: index {Integer} Index, at which the item will be inserted

@param.name: @param
@param.body: options {Map?null} Optional layout data for item.

raw: * Add an item before another already inserted item
* This method works on the widget's children list. Some layout managers
* (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional
* layout information. Other layout manager (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.Grid})
* ignore the children order for the layout process.
* @param child {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} item to add
* @param before {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} item before the new item will be inserted.
* @param options {Map?null} Optional layout data for item.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Add an item before another already inserted item This method works on the widget's children list. Some layout managers (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional layout information. Other layout manager (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.Grid}) ignore the children order for the layout process.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: child {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} item to add

@param.name: @param
@param.body: before {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} item before the new item will be inserted.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: options {Map?null} Optional layout data for item.

raw: * Add an item after another already inserted item

* (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional

* ignore the children order for the layout process.
* @param child {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} item to add
* @param after {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} item, after which the new item will be inserted
* @param options {Map?null} Optional layout data for item.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Add an item after another already inserted item This method works on the widget's children list. Some layout managers (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional layout information. Other layout manager (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.Grid}) ignore the children order for the layout process.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: child {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} item to add

@param.name: @param
@param.body: after {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} item, after which the new item will be inserted

@param.name: @param
@param.body: options {Map?null} Optional layout data for item.

raw: * Remove the item at the specified index.
* This method works on the widget's children list. Some layout managers
* (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional
* layout information. Other layout manager (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.Grid})
* ignore the children order for the layout process.
* @param index {Integer} Index of the item to remove.
* @return {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} The removed item

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Remove the item at the specified index. This method works on the widget's children list. Some layout managers (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional layout information. Other layout manager (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.Grid}) ignore the children order for the layout process.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: index {Integer} Index of the item to remove.

raw: * Handler for the selection change of the including class e.g. SelectBox,
* List, ...
* It sets the new modelSelection via {@link #setModelSelection}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Handler for the selection change of the including class e.g. SelectBox, List, It sets the new modelSelection via {@link #setModelSelection}.

raw: * Listener for the change of the internal model selection data array.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Listener for the change of the internal model selection data array.

raw: * Returns always an array of the models of the selected items. If no
* item is selected or no model is given, the array will be empty.
* *CAREFUL!* The model selection can only work if every item item in the
* selection providing widget has a model property!
* @return {qx.data.Array} An array of the models of the selected items.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns always an array of the models of the selected items. If no item is selected or no model is given, the array will be empty. CAREFUL! The model selection can only work if every item item in the selection providing widget has a model property!

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {qx.data.Array} An array of the models of the selected items.

raw: * Takes the given models in the array and searches for the corresponding
* selectables. If an selectable does have that model attached, it will be
* selected.
* *Attention:* This method can have a time complexity of O(n^2)!
* *CAREFUL!* The model selection can only work if every item item in the
* selection providing widget has a model property!
* @param modelSelection {Array} An array of models, which should be
*   selected.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Takes the given models in the array and searches for the corresponding selectables. If an selectable does have that model attached, it will be selected. Attention: This method can have a time complexity of O(n^2)! CAREFUL! The model selection can only work if every item item in the selection providing widget has a model property!

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
modelSelection {Array} An array of models, which should be
   selected.
